en: In which language do you want to communicate with me? To stop talking to me at, you can send /cancel at any time.
Are you already teaching or taking classes with us?
Please contact your coordinator to get the link to the new chat with coordinators.
What is your first name (include middle name if you wish)?
Do you wish to become a student or a teacher?
How old are you? We don't need your exact age, just choose the age group so we can find the best group for you.

Unfortunately, our teachers can only be 18 or more years old. Please let me how else you would like to contribute to our project and we will contact you via Telegram or email if something becomes available.
What is your last name (or whatever you want to use instead)?
How did you find out about Samantha Smith's Group?
so that you don't have to give us your phone number. But in this case please make sure you don't change your username while you're with us.
Please provide your phone number in *international format* \(starting with \+ or 00\) or just press the button below to send us your current phone number
Tap to share your phone number
This doesn't look like a valid email. Please try again.
Please provide a valid phone number
What's your timezone? Choose your current time (offset relative to UTC is indicated in parentheses)
What language do you want to learn\? Please note that you can only choose *one* language right now\. You can add a second language later on through our coordinator\.
What language(s) do you want to teach\?
To what levels would you like to teach
What language (apart from the language being learnt) can you communicate in during classes?

What language (apart from the language you teach) can you communicate in with students during classes? Please note that we are asking about your ability to speak Ukrainian or Russian fluently enough, not about your style of teaching
Only in the language I teach
How many groups would you like to teach?
I can take two right away!
How often do you intend to teach one group? Choose the most preferable option.
What age groups would you like to teach?

We not only teach our students foreign languages. We also organise speaking clubs in English and help them with putting together a good CV to find work. Are you able and willing to participate in hosting speaking clubs for students or help the students with their CVs?
I can help hosting speaking clubs
How could you help less experienced teachers in their work?
Do you have any other skills that you think could help us or our students?
Now let's quickly review your basic information.
You allowed to store your Telegram username
Your preferred language(s) of communication in class
What information do you wish to edit?
Is there anything else you want to tell us as a final comment?
Thank you! We will keep you in mind üòä
Thank you! We will message you here as soon as a group becomes available.
You canceled the registration process. Enter /start to start again.
